plot: After committing a terrible crime, Mafalda realizes she is no longer an innocent. Haunted by internal conflict and the darkness of the world around her, Mafalda descends into madness.
title: Mafalda
plot_es: After committing a terrible crime, Mafalda realizes she is no longer an innocent. Haunted by internal conflict and the darkness of the world around her, Mafalda descends into madness.
plot_en: After committing a terrible crime, Mafalda realizes she is no longer an innocent. Haunted by internal conflict and the darkness of the world around her, Mafalda descends into madness.
